plot: A young man and a Berliner vampire falls in love. Unknowingly, the gang the vampire belongs to have murdered the young man's family.
title: The Dawn
plot_es: A young man and a Berliner vampire falls in love. Unknowingly, the gang the vampire belongs to have murdered the young man's family.
plot_en: A young man and a Berliner vampire falls in love. Unknowingly, the gang the vampire belongs to have murdered the young man's family.
